newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan central bank injects T$23.664 bln in funds.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan central bank injects T$23.664 bln in funds.

text.p: Taiwan's central bank on Friday injected T$23.664 billion worth of funds into the banking system through open market operations, a central bank official said.
The bank, through three bills finance companies, bought T$23.664 billion in approved securities instruments offered by financial institutions with a single yield at 5.375 percent, the official said.
The institutions have the option of repurchasing the instruments between three and 28 days from now.
